    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water molecule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wassermolekül</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Molécule d'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Molécula de água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molecola di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόριο ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Molécula de agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the 2:1 ratio of hydrogen to oxygen atoms in the formation of water, with chemical formula H2O.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fixed composition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das 2:1 Verhältnis des 
Wasserstoffs zu den Sauerstoffatomen in der Anordnung des Wassers, mit
chemischer Formel H2O.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le rapport de 2:1 de 
l'hydrogène aux atomes d'oxygène dans la formation de l'eau, avec la
formule chimique H2O.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a relação de 2:1 do 
hidrogênio aos átomos de oxigênio na formação da água, com 
fórmula química H2O.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il rapporto di 2:1 di
idrogeno agli atomi di ossigeno nella formazione di acqua, con la 
formula chimica H2O.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αναλογία 2:1 του 
υδρογόνου στα άτομα οξυγόνου στο σχηματισμό του ύδατος, με το 
χημικό τύπο H2O.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la relación de 
transformación de 2:1 del hidrógeno a los átomos de oxígeno en la 
formación del agua, con el fórmula químico H2O.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Formel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
